segments.text: Can you make the tea , Sam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course I can , Penny . Is there any water in this kettle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s over there , behind the teapot . Can't you see it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can see the teapot , but I can ’ t see the tea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There it is ! It ’ s in front of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah yes , I can see it now . Where are the cups ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are some in the cupboard . Can you find them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hurry up , Sam . The kettle ’ s boiling .
segments.speaker: S1
